flawed_nl_solution:
The total number of tickets needed is 5 tickets + 4 tickets + 4 tickets = <<5+4+4=14>>14 tickets.
Jeanne needs 14 tickets - 5 tickets = <<14-5=9>>9 tickets.
#### 9
